answerText: oxidation-reduction reactions [accept in either order; or redox reactions] [10] One method for balancing redox reactions involves working with these components of the overall reaction. One in the permanganate-iron reaction is iron Fe2+ being oxidized to Fe3+ .
heading: Collegiate Novice |2012 | 10 | 19 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Titrating potassium permanganate with iron in acid produces this type of reaction.  [10] Name this class of reactions that involve the transfer of electrons and a change in oxidation state.
